actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to exclude from gross income the first $750 of interest received on deposits in certain financial institutions.

summary.text: Excludes from gross income under the Internal Revenue Code the first $750 of interest received on deposits in a bank (as defined under the Internal Revenue Code).

titles.title: A bill to exclude from gross income the first $750 of interest received on deposits in certain financial institutions.
